                              ∟ labelType
                              ∟ originalLabel: "Definition of number of years for deviated medium-term time horizon counted from reporting period"
                              ∟ documentation: "The value should be presented in years. By providing deviated time horizon the XBRL element represents the number of years counted from the end of the short-term time horizon."

            ∟ 1
              ∟ label: "Minimum Disclosure Requirement - policies related to own workforce"

                        ∟ 1
                          ∟ label: "Material risks and opportunities related to own workforce / value chain workers / affected communities / consumers and end-users"
                          ∟ labelType: "abstract"
